extendedInfo.description: Work scheduler is an application to manage your work effectively.Work scheduler is simple to use and manage your activities according to desire.Work Scheduler has several useful functionalities to manage your activities.This application is very useful for the students and working person to manage the time effectively of day to day life.The important Features of Work Scheduler are:>>To set reminder:You can set reminder for a day,week,Month with detailed description.You can set ring tone according to your choice for every reminder.You can remove the reminder whenever you want.>>Managing your daily activity:You can add activities according to your need with the default activities.You can remove the default activities when it is not needed .You can set the time for every activities according to you.>>Time Calculator:You can see your used time for every activity in the colorful pie-chart in percentage where you have spent either 24 hours, 30 days or 365 days.You can see your used time for any particular day in pie-chatYou can see your used time between any two days in pie-chart.We love creating apps, and want to keep them free forever. In order to keep our development running we are using a search service to generate some revenue from this free app. This app will add a couple search links on your device in the form of an icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You may delete them easily (drag to the trash or delete the link for the browser), if you choose to use them, thanks!
